Shade:AnimateDead.NAME: Animate Dead
Shade:AnimateDead.DESCRIPTION: Summon a zombie and a skeleton. NL Exhaust.
Shade:AnimateDead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon a zombie an two skeletons. NL Exhaust.

Shade:ClawBack.NAME: Claw Back
Shade:ClawBack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return a random exhausted class card to your draw pile.
Shade:ClawBack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return a random exhausted class card to your draw pile.
